content: Three lovely things about this app. 1. It has a nice user interface 2. It's Python IDE is the best so far on Android. 3. The lessons are so comprehensive 4. The code coaches and challenges are also outstanding. My suggestion. Please work more on the python IDE. Add a float button for "undo" instead of having it stay inside settings. Also add an auto save feature in the IDE too.
